ygData.subject: Re: For all posts Phobia
ygData.msgSnippet: I think we should consider our resources. Destructor offered us help, the alliance offered us help, I think we should move one step at a time. We have a five

"I think we should consider our resources. Destructor offered us 
help, the alliance offered us help, I think we should move one step 
at a time. We have a five bot group right now, Destructor makes six, 
Dollen and GoldenEye will be back soon theres eight add the alliance 
forces and we'll have a small army working with us, and then, then 
followers will join us or fall before us, and Megatron will be our 
first victim." Phobias eyes lit up at the prospect of being the bot 
behind the bot who joined the forces of Predacon and Alliance, being 
the unknown shadow that the great leaders throughout history have 
cast. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She thought about the situation.  She didn't know the bots who were 
> so far, helping htem out.  Usually when one helped, they expected 
the 
> favor returned, and with more in return than what was offered.  She 
> looked at Phobia,"Tell me, who is this Destrustor?  And why did he 
> help us? No Pred would just help and expect nothing in return. 
Also, 
> if Megatron is without followers, who does that leave us with? I 
> heard that most of our groups is gone."  She looked down and 
> sighed. "I know that I can only trust you and Drillbit right now."
> She looked up at Phobia.  "I think it would be best if we takled to 
> this Desctuctor. Then we need to get our group together.  I  know 
I"m 
> not the only one who wants to get Megatron for deserting us.  And 
> once Megatron is done with, we can then start looking for a base of 
> our own.  BUt Megatron has to be delt with. As long as he is 
around, 
> we will never have a moment's rest.  After that," she suddenly had 
an 
> angry look on her face,"After that, I want to pay back those 
slagging 
> maximals." She relaxed, "What do you think Phobia?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "We're currently at the base of a Predacon named Destrucror, 
> > Starscreem went ahead to the alliance base, Goldeneye and Dollen 
> are 
> > considering returning to us and Megatron is currently without 
> > followers I suggest we meet the alliance, track him down and take 
> > care of our problems one at a time." Phobia knew to leave out the 
> > part about Destructors offer so he'd have an ace in the hole if 
> this 
> > fell through. He didn't fully trust Destructor yet and KitKats 
> > trusting ways may get in the way of earning that trust.
> >
